name: line.ASSEMBLY (demonstration)
description:
An on-going simple experiment in controller expression. 

Use the left and right triggers on your DualShock 4 controller to control the strength of your robot's mallets. Gentle squeezes mean weaker hits, while aggressive inputs will smash the buttons on passing cubes down.

Note: Due to issues with WebGL inputs, the game may not work in certain browsers. We recommend you download and play the game locally instead.
